onboarding.confirm.title: Confirm
onboarding.step1.heading: Welcome to Cube Weather App!
onboarding.step1.paragraph: See the current temperature, hourly forecasts for the next 24 hours and a 7 day forecast for locations you monitor.
onboarding.step2.heading: Add your favourite locations
onboarding.step2.paragraph: Search for a location of interest or monitor your current location so you can see weather in areas of importance.
onboarding.step3.heading: Sign up to Cube Weather
onboarding.step3.paragraph: Sign up to save your favourite locations and receive personalised weather alerts.

search.placeholder: Search by postcode, town or country
